custom_line_width=”50″][vc_column_text]

Certified Fire-Rated Curtain Walls, Windows & Doors

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]All Alutech Aluminium And Glass fire-rated glazing systems have been independently tested and certified by third-party international testing laboratories/certifiers. Alutech Aluminium And Glass is an ISO 9001 registered company and with the support of our international supply chain partners, we offer our clients a full consultation, design, manufacture and installation service for all fire-rated glazing assemblies.

With the partnership of internationally prominent manufacturers of frames and glass (Forster & Vetrotech), Our  Fire Rated glazing systems can cover:

  • Integrity (E)
  • Integrity & Reduced Radiation (EW)
  • Integrity & Insulation (EI) applications

Our typical range of fire resistance achieved is:

  • E30 (30 minutes integrity only)
  • EI120 (120 minutes integrity & insulation)

*Higher values can be achieved on a project-specific basis.

**All our products are certified by Dubai and Abu Dhabi Civil Defense.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1627114540572{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-left: 40px !important;}”]“[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1630956855668{margin-top: -60px !important;padding-right: 80px !important;padding-left: 80px !important;}”]

Alutech Aluminium And Glass’s fire-rated glazing, windows, doors and curtain walls division provides a complete range of fully certified fire glazing systems that meet international and UAE Civil Defence standards for Fire Safety (BS, EN & ASTM).

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1627114509365{margin-top: -10px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;}”]

”
